pr_title: [JENKINS-60641, JENKINS-60644] incorrectly converted AntClassLoader.loadResource to a Java 5 for-loop

timeline.message: #4254 incorrectly converted AntClassLoader.loadResource to a Java 5 for-loop.

Reproduced error in functional test with a small sample plugin.
Without fix, Jenkins startup fails:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.Reader.<init>(Reader.java:78)
	at java.io.InputStreamReader.<init>(InputStreamReader.java:113)
	at org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils.copy(IOUtils.java:2440)
	at org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils.toString(IOUtils.java:1084)
	at io.jenkins.plugins.loads_resource.Main.stuff(Main.java:36)

timeline.bodyText: This is probably the only case where PluginManager.getPlugin("loads-resource") actually works in JTH :(
timeline.author: oleg-nenashev

replies.bodyText: Well, it would always work for loaded plugins, but normally the classLoader would just be AppClassLoader. You need to go out of your way to test the real plugin loaders.
